footer.tagline: Ebe ị ga-enweta ozi ziri ezi gbasara nsogbu ọkụ na nsonaazụ ule na Naịjirịa.
footer.copyright: © {year} NaijaInfo. Njikọ gọọmentị niile na-eduga na ọnụ ụzọ gọọmentị.

disclaimer.title: Ọkwa Nkwenye Data
disclaimer.text: A na-enyocha ozi kọntaktị na njikọ sitere na isi mmalite gọọmentị. Jide n'aka na ị na-enyocha na ọkwa gọọmentị DisCo na ụlọ ọrụ ule.

homepage.title: Nigeria Power & Exam Results Hub
homepage.description: Central source for Nigeria power outage updates, DisCo contacts, and official JAMB, WAEC, NECO result guides.

outages.title: Nigeria Power Outage Updates
outages.description: Official outage information for all Nigerian DisCos with reporting steps, contact numbers, and safety guides.

results.title: Nigeria Exam Results Hub
results.description: Official JAMB, WAEC, and NECO result guides with portal links, verification steps, and troubleshooting tips.

hero.title: Nigeria Power & Exam Results Hub
hero.subtitle: Ozi oge n'oge gbasara nsogbu ọkụ, ụzọ ịkọ akụkọ, na usoro enyochara iji lelee JAMB, WAEC, na NECO n'enweghị nsogbu.

officialAlert.title: Naanị Isi Mmalite Gọọmentị
officialAlert.description: Nsonaazụ ule niile na ozi nsogbu ọkụ na-ejikọ ozugbo na ọnụ ụzọ gọọmentị na DisCo. Anyị adịghị echekwa ma ọ bụ hazie data nkeonwe gị.

powerCard.title: Mmelite Nsogbu Ọkụ
powerCard.description: Soro nkwụsị na nrụzi ahazịrị n'ofe DisCos Naịjirịa na usoro ịkọ akụkọ ozugbo.
items: Ọnọdụ grid mba sitere na TCN
Ndepụta kọntaktị maka DisCos 12 na Aba Power
Otu esi akọ nsogbu site na ekwentị, SMS, ma ọ bụ ngwa
Ndụmọdụ nchekwa maka generators na inverters

examCard.title: Onye Nlele Nsonaazụ Ule
examCard.description: Ntuziaka nzọụkwụ site na nzọụkwụ iji lelee nsonaazụ gọọmentị JAMB, WAEC, na NECO na nkwenye.
items: JAMB e-Facility, CAPS, na nsonaazụ SMS
Tokens NECO na ọnụ ụzọ e-Verify
Otu esi edozi mperi nsonaazụ a na-ahụkarị

quickAccess.title: Nnweta Ngwa Ngwa Site na Ọnọdụ

emergency.title: Ị Chọrọ Enyemaka Mberede?
emergency.description: Maka nsogbu ọkụ dị ngwa ngwa, kpọọ nlekọta ndị ahịa DisCo mpaghara gị. Maka nsogbu nsonaazụ ule, kpọọ ahịrị enyemaka ụlọ ọrụ ule gọọmentị.

knowledgeBase.title: Nyochaa Ebe Nchekwa Ihe Ọmụma Zuru Ezu
knowledgeBase.description: Ntuziaka karịrị 30 na-ekpuchi ịkọ akụkọ nkwụsị, mita prepaid, nchekwa nkwụsị, na usoro nkwenye ule.

hero.title: Mmelite Nsogbu Ọkụ Naịjirịa
hero.subtitle: Soro ọnọdụ grid mba, nweta ozi nkwụsị ọnọdụ akọwapụtara, ma nweta ntuziaka ịkọ akụkọ nzọụkwụ site na nzọụkwụ maka Ụlọ Ọrụ Nkesa ọ bụla.

discoSection.title: Ntuziaka Nkwụsị Site na Ụlọ Ọrụ Nkesa

howToSection.title: Ntuziaka Otu-Esi-Eme
howToSection.subtitle: Mụta otu esi akọ nkwụsị, chọta onye na-enye gị nri, ma nọrọ ná nchekwa mgbe ọkụ kwụsịrị na ọdịnaya nzọụkwụ site na nzọụkwụ dị nkenke.

resourceSection.title: Ọba Akwụkwọ Akụrụngwa
resourceSection.subtitle: Chekwaa ndepụta kọntaktị dị mkpa, kalenda nrụzi, na ndụmọdụ mita prepaid maka ntụaka ngwa ngwa.

alert.title: Nọrọ Na-Amata Ihe N'Ụzọ Ziri Ezi
alert.description: Lelee mmelite mgbasa ozi ọha na eze na ọwa gọọmentị DisCo anyị jikọtara n'elu. Maka nsogbu grid mba, jide n'aka na ị na-akwado na Ụlọ Ọrụ Nnyefe Naịjirịa (TCN) tupu ịkesa ọkwa.

examCta.title: Ị Chọrọ Nkwado Ule Kama?
examCta.description: Gaa na Ebe Nsonaazụ maka ntuziaka JAMB, WAEC, na NECO na ọnụ ụzọ gọọmentị na usoro idozi nsogbu.

hero.title: Ebe Nsonaazụ Ule Naịjirịa
hero.subtitle: Jiri ọnụ ụzọ gọọmentị lelee akara gị, bipụta mpempe akwụkwọ, ma kwenye nsonaazụ. Ntuziaka ọ bụla nwere njikọ ntụkwasị obi, ego, na usoro idozi nsogbu.

highlightCard.readGuide: Gụọ Ntuziaka Nzọụkwụ Site na Nzọụkwụ

jambSection.title: Ntuziaka JAMB
jambSection.subtitle: Nweta nsonaazụ UTME, ọnọdụ nweta, na nhọrọ SMS gọọmentị na ọnụ ụzọ e-Facility.

waecSection.title: Ntuziaka WAEC
waecSection.subtitle: Mụta otu esi eji WAEC e-PINs, dozie mperi a na-ahụkarị, ma kwenye nsonaazụ onye asọmpi n'ụzọ nchekwa.

necoSection.title: Ntuziaka NECO
necoSection.subtitle: Zụta tokens NECO, lelee nsonaazụ SSCE, ma kwenye asambodo na e-Verify.

alert.title: Chebe Ihe Njirimara Gị
alert.description: Naanị tinye nọmba ndebanye aha, PINs, ma ọ bụ tokens na ọnụ ụzọ gọọmentị anyị jikọtara n'elu. Zere saịtị ndị ọzọ na-ekwu na ha nwere ike ịkwalite akara gị ma ọ bụ nakọta ụgwọ na-enweghị risiti.

outageCta.title: Ị Chọrọ Mmelite Nsogbu Ọkụ?
outageCta.description: Nyochaa ndị na-eso ụzọ nkwụsị DisCo, ndepụta kọntaktị, na ndụmọdụ nchekwa n'ofe Naịjirịa.

guidePages.outageDisclaimer: Dabere mgbe niile na ọwa gọọmentị DisCo maka nkwenye nkwụsị. Ntuziaka a na-achịkọta ozi ọha na eze iji nyere gị aka mee ihe ngwa ngwa n'oge nkwụsị.
guidePages.resultDisclaimer: Jiri ọnụ ụzọ ule gọọmentị mgbe niile. Ntuziaka a adịghị echekwa ozi nkeonwe ma ọ bụ ndị nlele ọzọ; ọ na-achịkọta ntuziaka ọha na eze maka nnweta ngwa ngwa.
